help.details:
> • Displays all available commands.
> • You can use /help <command name> to get more information about a given command.
> • Also includes a link to the support server.
help.title: Available commands
help.footer: Type /help <command name> for find out more!
help.helpName: Need more help or want to report a bug?

play.details:
> • /play song <title/link> allows you to play a specific song.
> • /play playlist <link> allows you to play the entire playlist.
play.noVC: You must be in the voice channel!
play.vcError:
Error joining the voice channel!
 Make sure I have sufficient permissions!

queue.details:
> • Displays the first 15 songs in the queue.
> • You can click the "Full Queue" button, then the bot will send the entire queue in a text file.
queue.noQueue: There is no queue for this server!
queue.title: Queue

errors.init: An error has occurred, please contact the developer with the error ID:
errors.permViewChannel: Missing VIEW CHANNEL permission for this channel
